item.title: Diary of a CEO style Instagram Reels (FREELANCER not agency) - Upwork
item.description:
Hey, I am hiring for an experienced short form video editor specialised with podcast clips and who can also do the Diary of a CEO style of clip. I have multiple clients who do podcasts so there is potential for plenty of work.

The ideal quality is something as close to what you’d see on the channel “Diary of a CEO” - referring to the trailer. Edits will need to be fast paced, high quality and engaging.

Only apply if you can reproduce this style. You must also be able to communicate effectively and turnaround videos within the deadlines.

Please share 2 examples of podcast trailers you have edited and add the word “clippa” at the top of your proposal to be considered.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 29, 2024 13:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia

item.title: Senior Video Editor for Making Training and Explainer Videos for our Applications - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Video Creator to join our team and take charge of producing high-quality training videos for our application. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record of analysing applications, creating video scripts, and developing comprehensive and high quality training materials.

Responsibilities
Analyse the application thoroughly to understand its functionalities and features.
Develop video scripts for training materials, breaking down complex information into clear and concise segments.
Create professional and engaging training videos, ensuring high-quality production.
Work efficiently to produce videos that convey information to users unfamiliar with the application.
Oversee online guide editor to quality of guides are at the level to base videos on

Experience
Minimum of 5 years of experience in creating training videos for applications.

Technical Skills
Video Editing Software Proficiency
Screen Recording Skills
Scriptwriting Proficiency
Visual Design Skills
Audio Editing
Animation Skills

Interpersonal Skills
Analytical Skills: Sharp analytical skills to dissect complex application features and present them logically within training videos.
Creativity: Creative thinking to bring innovation and engagement to training video content, presenting information in a visually appealing way.
Adaptability: Quick adaptability to new environments, technologies, and project requirements in a fast-paced setting.
Attention to Detail: Detail-oriented with a focus on producing high-quality work in training videos.

Remuneration:
10  to 20 USD per hour, full time workload
Working day and hours
Mon to Fri, some weekend work may be necessary to support our operation which is 24 x 7
Working hours are 8 hrs minimum between 8am to 6pm CAT, a time when most of staff and contractors work.  The candidate best be in the European Timezone.

Date needed to Start
As soon as possible

Onboarding and Local Environment Setup
As part of our comprehensive onboarding process, successful candidates will be required to undergo an induction that may span over a few days. It is important to note that this induction is designed to be completed at your own pace and within your own time, and it is an unpaid aspect of the onboarding process.
In ensuring a smooth transition onto our platform, setting up your local environment is a key step. The time needed can range from half a day to a week, depending on your familiarity. If you're already acquainted, it might just take a few hours.
It's worth mentioning that this onboarding process is unpaid and meant to be completed at your own pace, fitting into your personal schedule. While troubleshooting is part of the learning curve, any extra time spent is entirely your choice, without compensation. We appreciate your understanding and thank you for managing this in your own time.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 13:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Animation
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Animation
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Content Marketing Manager for Digital Marketing Podcast - Upwork
item.description:
About Me:

I host an emerging podcast on media mix optimization and paid marketing for startups. My podcast features interviews with top marketing experts, providing valuable insights for marketers at high-growth startups, founders, and anyone managing a paid marketing budget. I am seeking a talented Podcast Content Marketing Manager to join our team and help elevate our podcast's reach and engagement.

Job Description:

I am seeking a creative and detail-oriented Podcast Content Marketing Manager to manage the content production process for my marketing podcast. The ideal candidate will have experience in podcast content management, distribution, and amplification across multiple platforms. You will be responsible for packaging, creating micro-content, writing engaging LinkedIn posts, and managing a small team including a video editor and a virtual assistant.

Responsibilities:

Content Packaging:
Develop eye-catching thumbnails and titles for podcast episodes.
Write compelling podcast descriptions that capture the essence of each episode.

Micro-Content Creation:
Identify short, engaging video segments from podcast episodes for YouTube and other social media platforms.

LinkedIn Content Creation:
Produce engaging LinkedIn posts that link to podcast episodes or video segments.
Craft compelling hooks and narratives for LinkedIn posts to drive audience engagement.

Team Management:
Oversee the work of a video editor and a virtual assistant to ensure smooth and efficient content production and distribution.
Provide guidance and feedback to team members to maintain high-quality content standards.
Coordinate tasks and deadlines to ensure timely delivery of all content.

Requirements:

Proven experience in content marketing, particularly for podcasts or similar media.
Strong writing and editing skills, with an eye for detail and creativity.
Experience with video editing software to create micro-content.
Familiarity with LinkedIn and other social media platforms, including best practices for engagement and amplification.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks and deadlines.
Excellent team management and communication skills.
Passion for marketing and staying updated with industry trends.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in the marketing or media industry.
Knowledge of SEO and content optimization strategies.
Familiarity with podcast production tools and software.

How to Apply:

Please share previous examples of content you've helped produce. If possible, this would include not only video content but Twitter/Linkedin posts as well. My preference is to work with somebody that has experience in growing a business podcast.



Hourly Range: $72.00-$120.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 12:52 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Distribution & Promotion, AI Content Creation, Podcast, Content Marketing, Content Writing, Video Editing & Production, LinkedIn Marketing, Podcast Production
Skills: Content Distribution & Promotion, AI Content Creation, Podcast, Content Marketing, Content Writing, Video Editing & Production, LinkedIn Marketing, Podcast Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Tapping Your Fingers on Table Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I'm trying to find someone who can tap their fingers on a table for an hour 60. You can do this while you work, relax, study, watch a movie or anything in the background.

This doesn't have to be something you have to record in one period of time. You can record several 10 minute videos and combine them into an hour if it's easier for you. As long as each video is different.

I'm trying to find someone who can tap in smooth patterns really easily and loudly, similar to the video example here:

(link removed)

It's hard finding someone who can tap like this, so sending even a 10 second proposal of similar tapping would really help me find the right person for this, but it's not required. I added preferred camera angles for this video because I prefer the tapping being really close to the camera.

Hoping this will be easy and fun for someone to do and I'm hoping maybe to find someone I can keep going back to for this.

Thank you to anyone interested! Ask anything anytime!

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 29, 2024 12:50 UTC
Category: Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor Vloggs & Educations Channel | LONG TERM POSSITION - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a Video Editor who's awesome at editing vlogs and short videos. Your job will be to turn raw footage into engaging vlogs and shorts for our audience. Here are the main things you'd be doing:

- Editing vlogs and short videos.
- Making sure the videos look great on YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram
- Checking and fixing edits to make sure they're top-quality
- Listening to feedback and making changes when needed
- Keeping up with new trends and techniques to make our videos even better

If you've got some projects you've worked on before, especially vlogs and short videos, we'd love to see them!

Hourly Range: $6.00-$12.00

item.title: Video Editor to create Videos for Ads and Instagram. ( In French ) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for a video editor who can produce Videos for Ads in 9:16, 1:1 and 16:9 format.

It's principaly in French, so you need to understand French. (If you speak only English you can send me a message too, there are also differents videos to make in English)

The first mission can start today. It's a short mission that can become a long-term mission.

Don't hesitate to send me your portfolio with your creations.

I am looking for someone who is punctual and takes initiative.
There are some guidelines but I leave it to the imagination.

The pleasure of working with you.

Thank You

----------------------------------

En Français

Bonjour,

Je recherche un monteur vidéo capable de produire des vidéos publicitaires sur les 9:16, 1:1 et 16:9.

C'est principalement en français, il faut donc comprendre le français.

La première mission peut commencer dès aujourd'hui. C'est une mission courte qui peut devenir une mission à long terme.

N'hésitez pas à m'envoyer votre portfolio avec vos créations.

Je recherche une personne ponctuelle et qui fait preuve d'initiative.
Il existe quelques lignes directrices mais je laisse libre cours à l'imagination.

Le plaisir de travailler avec vous.

Merci

Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 12:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, TikTok Video, Instagram Reels, Color Grading, YouTube, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Final Cut Pro, Facebook Advertising
